multiple-choice.question:
Let $n \geq 3$ be an integer and consider a group $P_1,P_2,\dots,P_n$ of $n$ people. Each of these people has a uniformly random birthday, which is independent of the birthdays of the other people. We ignore leap years; thus, the year has 365 days.
Define the random variable $X$ to be the number of unordered triples $\{P_i,P_j,P_k\}$ of people (i.e., subsets consisting of three people) that have the same birthday.
What is the expected value $\mathbb{E}(X)$ of $X$?
Hint: Use indicator random variables.
